DataElement.preferredName: Work Productivity and Activity Impairment Questionnaire: Specific Health Problem V2.0 Past Week Hours Missed from Work Because of Health Problems Number
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A person's stated observation of how many hours they missed from work because of their health problem.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Work Productivity and Activity Impairment Questionnaire: Specific Health Problem Past Week Hours Missed from Work Because of Health Problems
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A questionnaire designed to measure the effect of a limited or local physical or emotional problem or symptom on an individual’s ability to work and perform regular activities. It measures absenteeism, presenteeism, as well as impairments in unpaid activity because of a health problem.:The most recent week. May include the present day._A question about how many hours an individual missed from work because of their health problems.

ObjectClass.preferredName: Work Productivity and Activity Impairment Questionnaire: Specific Health Problem
ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A questionnaire designed to measure the effect of a limited or local physical or emotional problem or symptom on an individual’s ability to work and perform regular activities. It measures absenteeism, presenteeism, as well as impairments in unpaid activity because of a health problem.

Concepts.longName: Work Productivity and Activity Impairment Questionnaire: Specific Health Problem
Concepts.definition: A questionnaire designed to measure the effect of a limited or local physical or emotional problem or symptom on an individual’s ability to work and perform regular activities. It measures absenteeism, presenteeism, as well as impairments in unpaid activity because of a health problem.

Property.preferredName: Past Week Hours Missed from Work Because of Health Problems
Property.preferredDefinition: The most recent week, including today.:A question about how many hours an individual missed from work because of their health problems.

Concepts.definition: The most recent week. May include the present day.

Concepts.longName: Hours Missed from Work Because of Health Problems
Concepts.definition: A question about how many hours an individual missed from work because of their health problems.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Process and results associated with self-reported measures and instruments, surveys, other tools

DataElementConcept.origin: WPAI-GH:Work Productivity and Activity Impairment Questionnaire-General Health V2.0. Reilly MC, Zbrozek AS, Dukes EM., 1993.
DataElementConcept.changeDescription: Created for NRG study CC003 in Rave per request by R.Bonanni. mc 8/28/15

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: the number to represent a unit measure of time equal to 3,600 seconds or 60 minutes.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: In modern usage, an hour is defined as a unit of time 60 minutes, or 3600 seconds in length. It is approximately 1/24 of a median day.:Number; a concept of quantity derived from zero and units; a numeral or string of numerals that is used for identification.

Concepts.definition: A unit measure of time equal to 3,600 seconds or 60 minutes. It is approximately 1/24 of a median day.
A numeral or string of numerals expressing value, quantity, or identification.

ValueDomain.origin: CALGB CRF:Cancer and Leukemia Group B Case Report Form

ReferenceDocuments.name: PQT
ReferenceDocuments.description: During the past seven days, how many hours did you miss from work because of problems related to your PROBLEM?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Alliance CRF Text 1
ReferenceDocuments.description: During the past seven days, how many hours did you miss from work because of problems associated with your breast cancer?
